title: Please Rito, put in some sort of system to stop this from happening

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
In Vayne's own words "I am good at everything". Her actual quote in champion select, and she is ranked 5 with Vayne, so much for ranks. 3686 damage TOTAL to champions in 20 minutes, that is 184 damage a MINUTE. She had 2 kills and no assists, she was involved in killing TWO champions for the entire game.

Bot lane failed hard, bot lane roamed to mid, I failed, than they grouped and finished us off. I get stuck in these gamed with wannabes who fail miserably and for what? Just so I can get the same shitty loss as them no matter how hard I try.

And yes, for all you ass lickers, I am naming and shaming someone who acted like they were gods gift to the world and failed, bringing down myself and Teemo who were actually doing better than the rest, FFS, a Teemo against a Poppy doing better than 3 of my teammates.

Low ranked players like to buff and puff and blow themselves down, it's sad and needs to stop. You need to implement a system, at least at lower ranks that will get those types of players to be grouped with those types of players, something that gets those who don't play like that out of this shit rank.
